p: The V of spermatozoa treated with TTO ( Figure 1A) was statically reduced starting from a concentration of 1 mg/mL ( p = 0.037) and up to 2 mg/mL ( p < 0.0001). Spermatozoa treated with TER showed a significant reduction in V ( p = 0.008; Figure 1B) only for the three highest tested concentrations (equivalent to 1.6, 1.8, and 2 mg/mL of TTO).
